# RCSHandle.uri(_:)

**Case**

A handle that represents a single recipient or sender, as identified by a URI.

## Declaration

```swift
case uri(RCSHandle.URI)
```

## Discussion

To create a URI handle from a phone number, use the [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSHandle/phoneNumber(_:)] method. The created URI will use the `tel:` scheme.

## Accessing handle values

- **RCSHandle.URI**: A structure that represents an RCS URI handle.
- **RCSHandle.group(_:)**: A handle that represents a group.
- **RCSHandle.Group**: A structure that represents an RCS group handle.
